---
title: "R Notebook"
---

```{r}
articles <- list.files(path = ".", pattern = "\\.md$")
for (i in articles){
  temp <- readLines(i, warn = F)
  imgPos <- regexpr("\\{\\% asset_img .*? %}",temp) # {% asset_img %}
  
  if (all(imgPos < 0)){
    next
  }
  
  temp[imgPos > 0] <- gsub("\\{\\% asset_img ", "![](",temp[imgPos > 0])
  temp[imgPos > 0] <- gsub(" \\%\\}", ")",temp[imgPos > 0])
  
  writeLines(temp, i)
}
```
